Shortsword Light Finesse

Slicing Shortsword is one of the Shortsword Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Slicing Shortsword is an enchanted shortsword that inflicts Bleeding when attacking with Advantage. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
